text: "Tomorrow" is a song by the Australian rock band Silverchair. It was released as the group's first single in 1994. It was later re-recorded for their 1995 debut album Frogstomp. It reached number-one on the charts in Australia, becoming their first of three number-one singles there. The song was written by the group's lead singer and guitarist Daniel Johns, as well as the group's drummer, Ben Gillies. Category:1994 songs
title: Tomorrow (Silverchair song)
